fn.p: Competing Interests: MJV received research support from Gilead Sciences (IN-US-174-3939) and the Fogarty International Center at US National Institutes of Health (K01TW009998). The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. Funding from Gilead Sciences does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
